gen:link.msg:message: `NumberOfHomesAboveCutOffLimit` MUST be reported with `MunicipalityAxis`, because `MunicipalityAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU3_Set00MunicipalityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU3_Set00MunicipalityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfHomesAboveLiberalisation` MUST be reported with `MunicipalityAxis`, because `MunicipalityAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU4_Set00MunicipalityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU4_Set00MunicipalityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfHomesAboveQuality` MUST be reported with `MunicipalityAxis`, because `MunicipalityAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00MunicipalityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU2_Set00MunicipalityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated` MUST also be reported, because at least one of the underlying values of `NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_ChildrenOfNumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ChildrenExistParentExists1_NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated` MUST be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_NumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1SumOfChildren1_ChildrenOfNumberOfIndependentPropertiesAllocated return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NumberOfIndependentPropertiesEqualBelowQuality` MUST be reported with `MunicipalityAxis`, because `MunicipalityAxis` is reported on. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00MunicipalityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NumberOfAssignmentsPermitHoldersHousingDvi_PrtFST1ExistenceTAxisThnExistenceCovU1_Set00MunicipalityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
